languages.text: {n}Нет времени для раздумий! Вы выхватываете оружие и принимаете боевую стойку, готовясь к рывку. Но Немезит уже целится в вас, ехидно улыбаясь. Черное дуло смотрит в вашу сторону, и мир вокруг сужается в тонкую линию.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
- Немезит вскакивает и наставляет на игрока пистолет
- игрок достает мили оружие

traits.locale_text: {n}Нет времени для раздумий! Вы выхватываете оружие и принимаете боевую стойку, готовясь к рывку. Но Немезит уже целится в вас, ехидно улыбаясь. Черное дуло смотрит в вашу сторону, и мир вокруг сужается в тонкую линию.{/n}

languages.translation_comment:
- Немезит вскакивает и наставляет на игрока пистолет
- игрок достает мили оружие

languages.text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нет времени для раздумий! Вы выхватываете оружие и принимаете боевую стойку, готовясь к рывку. Но Немезит уже целится в вас, ехидно улыбаясь. Черное дуло смотрит в вашу сторону, и мир вокруг сужается в тонкую линию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin stretched over his face. Its black muzzle stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin stretched over his face. Its black muzzle stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

{n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

languages.text: {n}¡No hay tiempo para hablar! Desenfundas tu arma y adoptas una postura de carga, pero Nemesitio ya te está apuntando con una sonrisa malévola en su rostro. El cañón negro de su revólver compacto te mira a los ojos, y el mundo que te rodea se limita a una delgada línea.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}¡No hay tiempo para hablar! Desenfundas tu arma y adoptas una postura de carga, pero Nemesitio ya te está apuntando con una sonrisa malévola en su rostro. El cañón negro de su revólver compacto te mira a los ojos, y el mundo que te rodea se limita a una delgada línea.{/n}

languages.text: {n}細かい事を考える時間はない！あなたは武器を手に取り、体勢を整え、突撃の準備をした。しかしネメサイトはすでに銃口をあなたに向けており、その顔には悪意に満ちた笑みが広がっている。リボルバーの黒い銃口があなたを見つめている。あなたの周りの世界が、細い線の様に変わっていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}細かい事を考える時間はない！あなたは武器を手に取り、体勢を整え、突撃の準備をした。しかしネメサイトはすでに銃口をあなたに向けており、その顔には悪意に満ちた笑みが広がっている。リボルバーの黒い銃口があなたを見つめている。あなたの周りの世界が、細い線の様に変わっていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}已经没时间考虑了！你拔出武器，摆好姿势，准备冲向敌人，但涅墨斯特手中的枪口早已对准了你。他的脸上露出了恶毒的笑容，短筒左轮手枪黑色的枪口瞄准了你，你周围的世界缩成了一条细线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}已经没时间考虑了！你拔出武器，摆好姿势，准备冲向敌人，但涅墨斯特手中的枪口早已对准了你。他的脸上露出了恶毒的笑容，短筒左轮手枪黑色的枪口瞄准了你，你周围的世界缩成了一条细线。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zum Nachdenken ist keine Zeit! Du ziehst deine Waffe, nimmst eine Kampfhaltung ein und bereitest den Angriff vor. Aber Nemesit zielt bereits auf dich und grinst bösartig über das ganze Gesicht. Die schwarze Mündung des Stummelrevolvers starrt dich an, und die Welt um dich herum verengt sich zu einer dünnen Linie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zum Nachdenken ist keine Zeit! Du ziehst deine Waffe, nimmst eine Kampfhaltung ein und bereitest den Angriff vor. Aber Nemesit zielt bereits auf dich und grinst bösartig über das ganze Gesicht. Die schwarze Mündung des Stummelrevolvers starrt dich an, und die Welt um dich herum verengt sich zu einer dünnen Linie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pas le temps de tergiverser ! Vous dégainez votre arme et adoptez une posture offensive avant de passer à l'attaque, mais Némésite vous tient déjà en joue, un sourire malveillant aux lèvres. La bouche noire de son revolver est braquée sur votre personne, et le monde autour de vous se réduit à une simple ligne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pas le temps de tergiverser ! Vous dégainez votre arme et adoptez une posture offensive avant de passer à l'attaque, mais Némésite vous tient déjà en joue, un sourire malveillant aux lèvres. La bouche noire de son revolver est braquée sur votre personne, et le monde autour de vous se réduit à une simple ligne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ölçüp biçecek vakit yok! Silahını çekip saldırıya hazırlık duruşuna geçiyorsun. Nemezit ise suratına yayılan kindar sırıtış eşliğinde silahını hâlihazırda sana doğrultmuş. Bodur altıpatların siyah ağzı sana bakıyor ve etrafını saran dünya, incecik bir çizgiye dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is no time to deliberate! You draw your weapon and assume a stance, preparing to charge. But Nemesite is already aiming his gun at you, a malevolent grin spread over his face. The black muzzle of the stub revolver stares at you, and the world around you narrows to a thin line.{/n}
